Batch processing: yes
DAPI Channel: 1
Actin Channel: 3
Protein Channel: 2
Thresholding for actin: automatic
Lower Threshold to create masks of whole cells: 55
Upper Threshold to create masks of whole cells: 255
Filtering options for actin mask - Gaussian blur radius [px]: 2
Filtering options for actin mask - Median: 2
Analysis of cytoplasm and nuclei: yes
Thresholding for the nuclei: automatic
Lower threshold to create masks of the nuclei: 20
Upper threshold to create masks of the nuclei: 255
Filter options for nuclei mask - Median: 10
